metadata.synopsis: Shocking allegations force a man (Tomer Sisley) to travel to the jungles of Myanmar to clear his name.

reviews: It suffers from the usual underdog flaw of having to try too hard.
Despite its delusions, this is no Ghost Protocol.
blepeis toys hthopoioys na pairnoyn anasa apognwshs prin ekferoyn tis atakes toys
far too much attention put on the action sequences, the quality of which comes at the cost of every other aspect of the film.
